meanings.definition: Made by chemical synthesis, especially to imitate a natural product.
meanings.sent1: The synthetically produced fabric felt smooth and shiny.
meanings.sent2: She wore a synthetically colored dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The synthetically flavored ice cream tasted surprisingly good.
meanings.sent4: His synthetically created artwork captured the essence of nature.
meanings.sent5: The synthetically scented candles filled the room with a pleasant aroma.
